name: Rift Boy
description:
Description:

Play as Rift boy who weilds the rift gun; A device to Rewind Space in a certain location and  allow Rift Boy to interect with it. Figure out how to beat the levels in this puzzle platformer using remenants form the future and the past.

Brackeys Game Jam game (Rewind) game.

Links:
This is my first Game Jam ever  and I'm super proud of how it turned out, I did document my progress and methods and will be uploading the video to my youtube page:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCna1doUbb3JjG2AjSBTYH1g

Controls:

  • WASD: Move around
  • Space: Jump
  • LeftMouse: Fire/Punch
  • Q: Switch weapon
